name: Auto: Wearying Frost
description: Your Superconduct and Frozen will decrease the target's ATK by 6 until their next action has ended. (Can stack)
descriptionraw: Your {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Superconduct</color> and {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Frozen</color> will decrease the target's ATK by 6 until their next action has ended. (Can stack)
descriptionreplaced: Your {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Superconduct</color> and {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Frozen</color> will decrease the target's ATK by 6 until their next action has ended. (Can stack)
